Article.ArticleTitle: Relapsing toxic epidermal necrolysis following COVID-19.

MedlineCitation.CoiStatement: Dr Min is on the advisory boards of Horizon, McGraw Hill, and BMS and is an investigator for Amgen, BI, MBS, and Priovant. Dr Rojek has served on the advisory board of Boehringer Ingelheim. The other authors have no conflicts of interest to declare.
